alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 15 at 11:55AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin and Lost River Valley zones. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 2.5 Mon 10 am MD 3.1 3.7 4.0 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ068-074-162200- /O.NEW.KPIH.FL.A.0002.230518T2116Z-000000T0000Z/ /HWRI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1155 AM MDT Mon May 15 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM MDT Monday the stage was 2.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys
